content.title: Equipment Lead Time Index — transformer crisis
content.hook: Transformer lead times are at 212 on our index (baseline 100). The grid can't be built fast enough.

content.title: What PE firms miss in energy due diligence
content.hook: Most PE energy DD misses interconnection risk entirely. Here's why it matters and what to look for.

content.title: Build-in-public: How I built an energy data platform in 3 weeks
content.hook: 3 weeks ago I had an idea. Now I have 12 live data tools, an API with 96 endpoints, and 35K projects indexed.
